mentions.context: This is called an anchor in FCA-Map.
Without option -only-cores, Graph-FCA outputs additional concepts that represent approximate alignments, such as {o1:z1, o1:z3, o2:i1, o2:i3} or {o1:lastname, o2:name, o2:given}.
Without common values nor any pre-aligned pairs, Graph-FCA only finds the meta-concepts, like in pattern Q2 in the above scenario.
matching) several biomedical ontologies, in a system called FCA-Map [15].
